name: matrix-os
description: Core of the device layer for AdMobilize Matrix devices. Includes global component, npm install -g matrix-cli

scripts.deploy-clear: sudo rm -r db node_modules/matrix-firebase node_modules/matrix-app-config-helper node_modules/matrix-node-sdk node_modules/matrix-eventfilter
scripts.deploy-copy: cd node_modules; cp -r ../../matrix-firebase ./matrix-firebase; cp -r ../../matrix-app-config-helper ./matrix-app-config-helper; cp -r ../../matrix-node-sdk ./matrix-node-sdk; cp -r ../../matrix-eventfilter ./matrix-eventfilter; cd ..;
scripts.deploy-image: find apps -name '*.matrix' ! -name 'monitor.matrix' -type d -exec rm -r {} +; docker build --no-cache -t matrix/matrix-os .;docker push admobilize/matrix-os
scripts.local-setup: cd node_modules; ln -s ../../matrix-firebase ./matrix-firebase; ln -s ../../matrix-app-config-helper ./matrix-app-config-helper; ln -s ../../matrix-node-sdk ./matrix-node-sdk; ln -s ../../matrix-eventfilter ./matrix-eventfilter; cd ..
scripts.sync: rsync -e ssh --progress package.json index.js pi@m:matrix-test/matrix-os/;rsync -ru -e ssh --progress lib/ apps/ test/ pi@m:matrix-test/matrix-os/

author: Sean Canton <sean.canton@admobilize.com>
